mapper.select: select tp.tpl_ccustomerid, tp.tpl_ccompanyid, tp.tpl_cworktypeid, tp.tpl_cphase, tp.tpl_nseq, tp.tpl_dstartdate, tp.tpl_denddate, tp.tpl_cmodifieruserid, tp.tpl_dmodifieddate, tp.tpl_cmodifierprogramid, tp.tpl_csqltype, tp.tpl_csql, tp.tpl_cuseflg, tp.tpl_filepath, tp.tpl_csparechar01, tp.tpl_csparechar02, tp.tpl_csparechar03, tp.tpl_csparechar04, tp.tpl_csparechar05, tp.tpl_csparechar06, tp.tpl_csparechar07, tp.tpl_csparechar08, tp.tpl_csparechar09, tp.tpl_csparechar10, tp.tpl_nsparenum01, tp.tpl_nsparenum02, tp.tpl_nsparenum03, tp.tpl_nsparenum04, tp.tpl_nsparenum05, tp.tpl_nsparenum06, tp.tpl_nsparenum07, tp.tpl_nsparenum08, tp.tpl_nsparenum09, tp.tpl_nsparenum10, tp.tpl_dsparedate01, tp.tpl_dsparedate02, tp.tpl_dsparedate03, tp.tpl_dsparedate04, tp.tpl_dsparedate05, tp.tpl_dsparedate06, tp.tpl_dsparedate07, tp.tpl_dsparedate08, tp.tpl_dsparedate09, tp.tpl_dsparedate10 from tmg_pluggable tp where tp.tpl_ccustomerid = #{customerId} and tp.tpl_ccompanyid = #{companyId} and tp.tpl_cworktypeid = #{workType} and tp.tpl_cuseflg = 'TMG_ONOFF|1' and tp.tpl_cphase = #{cphase} and tp.tpl_dstartdate <= #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=DATE} and tp.tpl_denddate >= #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=DATE} order by tp.tpl_nseq
